description:
These breathable, high-quality, mid-weight wool cycling socks provide warmth and comfort when riding in cool conditions.

  • Made of Australian merino wool that won't itch, nylon, recycled polyester and Lycra®
  • Long wool cuff provides extra protection under cycling tights
  • Wool, terry-loop foot-bed creates a soft, warm micro-environment
  • Machine washable in cold water without bleach. Can be tumble dried at low heat
name: DeFeet Woolie Boolie 6" Blend Socks - Unisex
